decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with elves and utilizing cards like Fauna Shaman to search for key creatures like Vengevine. The goal is to flood the board with powerful elf creatures and pump them up with Ezuri, Renegade Leader and Joraga Warcaller to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive playstyle. Nissa Revane provides additional elf support while Eldrazi Monument gives the deck a powerful anthem effect to make the elves even more threatening. The deck aims to win by establishing a dominant board presence and delivering quick, decisive attacks.

The deck focuses on using control elements like counterspells (Mana Leak), removal (Lightning Bolt), and card draw (Jace's Ingenuity) to maintain board presence and out-value opponents. This is complemented by powerful planeswalker (Jace, the Mind Sculptor) and big creature threats (Frost Titan, Avenger of Zendikar) to close out the game. The deck also features mana ramp (Lotus Cobra, Explore) to accelerate into its high-cost threats and landfall triggers (Oracle of Mul Daya) for additional value. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and win through superior card advantage and powerful threats.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Lotus Cobra and Birds of Paradise while using Fauna Shaman to search for key creatures like Vengevine. The goal is to apply early pressure with aggressive creatures like Nest Invader and finish off the opponent with powerful threats like Frost Titan. Cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Mana Leak provide control elements to protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed, power, and resilience.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Joraga Treespeaker, Overgrown Battlement, and Explore, in order to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, Ulamog, and Kozilek. The deck also includes control elements such as Tectonic Edge, Mystifying Maze, and Wurmcoil Engine to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats while maintaining control over the game through mana acceleration and disruptive spells.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana with cards like Explore, Growth Spasm, and Joraga Treespeaker, while using Eldrazi Temple and Overgrown Battlement to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Primeval Titan and Ulamog. Control elements like Tectonic Edge and All Is Dust help keep the opponent in check, while Summoning Trap can bring out big threats unexpectedly. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures like Emrakul and Kozilek, while also having ways to deal with opposing threats through cards like Terastodon and Eye of Ugin.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and using burn spells efficiently. The goal is to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent, while steadily reducing their life total. With a strong lineup of creatures like Goblin Guide and Kargan Dragonlord, coupled with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Flame Slash, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a swift victory.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Birds of Paradise, Lotus Cobra, and Joraga Treespeaker to play powerful threats like Vengevine and Eldrazi Monument. Fauna Shaman helps find key creatures while Garruk Wildspeaker provides additional ramp and token generation. Unified Will provides protection against opponent's spells while Jace, the Mind Sculptor provides card advantage and control. Khalni Garden and Nest Invader provide additional creatures for sacrifice or blocking. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with fast plays and powerful creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control over the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage through card draw and scrying effects. By controlling the board state and protecting key threats like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Frost Titan, the deck aims to outlast and outvalue the opponent until it can secure victory. Additionally, the deck utilizes land disruption with cards like Spreading Seas to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. Ultimately, the goal is to grind out incremental advantages and win through a combination of card advantage and powerful threats.

The deck focuses on ramping up quickly with mana acceleration cards like Joraga Treespeaker and Everflowing Chalice to cast big Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog. Tectonic Edge and Eldrazi Temple provide additional mana advantages. The deck also includes control elements like All Is Dust to clear the board and Summoning Trap to cheat out creatures. Primeval Titan can search for utility lands like Eye of Ugin to further support the Eldrazi strategy. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful Eldrazi creatures while controlling the game with removal and disruption spells.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly in order to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Primeval Titan, Ulamog, and Emrakul. The deck utilizes cards like Cultivate, Explore, and Joraga Treespeaker to accelerate mana production, while also having control elements like Tectonic Edge and All Is Dust to disrupt opponents. Summoning Trap can be used to cheat out big creatures for free, and Wurmcoil Engine provides additional threats and lifegain. The overall strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with massive, hard-to-deal-with creatures.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using powerful creatures like Frost Titan and Inferno Titan, along with planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Garruk Wildspeaker. It also includes cards like Mana Leak and Lightning Bolt to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes ramp cards like Lotus Cobra and Explore to quickly ramp up to the devastating Destructive Force, which can clear the board and give the player a huge advantage. Overall, the deck aims to dominate the game through a mix of control and destructive forces.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent by using aggressive red creatures and burn spells. The key strategy involves maximizing damage output by efficiently using mana and leveraging the synergy between creatures like Kiln Fiend and Plated Geopede with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of land cards like Teetering Peaks and Arid Mesa helps to consistently provide the necessary mana resources for the aggressive playstyle.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Pyromancer Ascension to duplicate powerful spells such as Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning, enabling you to quickly overwhelm your opponent with increased spell efficiency. By combining card draw and counter spells like Mana Leak and Deprive, as well as utilizing Jace, the Mind Sculptor for additional control, the deck aims to establish board dominance and achieve victory through a potent combination of synergy and tempo advantage.

The central idea of this deck is to take advantage of the strong synergy between spells and Pyromancer Ascension. By casting cheap instants and sorceries, the player can quickly charge up the enchantment and start doubling the effects of their spells. This allows for explosive turns and efficient card advantage, overwhelming the opponent with a flurry of powerful spells. The deck also includes card draw and counter spells to keep the player's hand full and protect their combo pieces, ensuring that they can assemble the necessary resources to win the game.

The focus of this deck is to quickly assemble Pyromancer Ascension and then use spells like Burst Lightning, Lightning Bolt, and Mana Leak to trigger it and generate powerful card advantage and removal. The deck also includes card selection spells like Preordain and See Beyond to dig for key combo pieces. With Jace Beleren providing card draw and Call to Mind to recur important spells, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of efficient spells while controlling the board.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through cards like Cultivate and Harrow to get Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle active, then using Primeval Titan and Avenger of Zendikar to create powerful board presence and deal consistent damage to the opponent. Additionally, cards like Lightning Bolt provide removal and utility, while Summoning Trap allows for explosive plays with high mana creatures. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through efficient ramp and powerful threats to overwhelm the opponent.
